data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đang nấu ăn trong nhà bếp.
data.en_hint: She is cooking in the kitchen.
data.content_game_1: She is cooking in the kitchen.
data.answer_en_hint: She is cooking in the kitchen.

data.trans_hint: Có rất nhiều thực phẩm và trái cây trong tủ lạnh.
data.en_hint: There are much foods and fruits in the refrigerator.
data.content_game_1: There are much foods and fruits in the refrigerator.
data.answer_en_hint: There are much foods and fruits in the refrigerator.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy bỏ một ít dầu vào trong nồi để nấu món thịt.
data.en_hint: He puts some oil into the pot to cook the meat.
data.content_game_1: He puts some oil into the pot to cook the meat.
data.answer_en_hint: He puts some oil into the pot to cook the meat.

data.trans_hint: Có năm cái bát đầy canh trên bàn.
data.en_hint: There are five bowls full of soup on the table.
data.content_game_1: There are five bowls full of soup on the table.
data.answer_en_hint: There are five bowls full of soup on the table.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy mua cho tôi một cái máy pha cà phê.
data.en_hint: He bought a coffee maker for me.
data.content_game_1: He bought a coffee maker for me.
data.answer_en_hint: He bought a coffee maker for me.

data.trans_hint: Dao rất nguy hiểm đối với trẻ em, chúng có thể cắt đứt tay.
data.en_hint: Knives are dangerous for children, they can cut their fingers.
data.content_game_1: knives are dangerous for children, they can cut their fingers.
data.answer_en_hint: knives are dangerous for children, they can cut their fingers.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy cầm dao và dĩa lên rồi bắt đầu ăn món bít tết.
data.en_hint: She picked up her knife and fork and started to eat the steak.
data.content_game_1: She picked up her knife and fork and started to eat the steak.
data.answer_en_hint: She picked up her knife and fork and started to eat the steak.

data.trans_hint: Cậu bé đang ăn bằng thìa.
data.en_hint: The little boy is eating by a spoon.
data.content_game_1: The little boy is eating by a spoon.
data.answer_en_hint: The little boy is eating by a spoon.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy mang cho tôi một đĩa đầy rau.
data.en_hint: She brought me a plate full of vegetable.
data.content_game_1: She brought me a plate full of vegetable.
data.answer_en_hint: She brought me a plate full of vegetable.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy dùng chảo để rán cá.
